title: 1 Bedroom Close to Downtown LA + Quartz + Call US Today!
posting_body: The Collective is the ultimate destination for comfortable living in the heart of Los Angeles.
Feel the pulse of the city while enjoying the comfort of your apartment home.

Embrace the convenience of being just minutes away from downtown Los Angeles points of interest such as Vista Hermosa Natural Park, world-famous Sunset Boulevard, Dodger Stadium, Staples Center, The Museum of Contemporary Art, Walt Disney Concert Hall, and Los Angeles Central Library, just to name a few.
In such a convenient location, residents relish in being close to so many necessities and fun destinations.
Restaurants, shopping, schools, and parks are all just steps away.
Our apartments for rent in Los Angeles are less than a mile away from the junction of the 101 and 110 highways.
Choosing to make our Los Angeles apartments your new home is an easy decision.
Our versatile space is suitable for anyone to feel comfortable.
Enjoy our well-planned apartments, on-site laundry care center, and sunny courtyard social hubs perfect for enjoying a warm LA afternoon.
The Collective is located right at the crossroads of culture and community in the historic Westlake North neighborhood.
Surrounded on all sides by vibrant city living, our community brings a breath of fresh air to a neighborhood brimming with life.
Our one and two-bedroom apartments will provide the comfort and space you crave.
Contact us today to learn more about our apartments in Los Angeles, CA.
Pets Welcome with an Additional Deposit.
Price & availability are subject to change.
Square footage may not be exact.

Staples Center, Regal LA Live & 4DX, Los Angeles Convention Center, Arts District, Dodger Stadium, Downtown Los Angeles, Filipinotown, MacArthur Park, City West, Angelino Heights, Echo Park, Central LA, Koreatown, Miracle Mile, Mid-Wilshire, Westlake, East Hollywood
